# Electrode metadata element schema

**Description:** Electrode metadata element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

## Electrode Identifier

**Label:** electrodeID

**Description:** Unique identifier for the electrode, to match and be referenced in channel description.

**Required:** Yes

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/9ccf049b-6f1a-4a74-98b3-25aa6bcb0a8a) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }
  },
  "type": "object",
  "title": "electrodeID field schema",
  "description": "electrodeID field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": true
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"
        },
        {
          "type": "array",
          "minItems": 1,
          "items": {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          "uniqueItems": true
        }
      ]
    },
    "@value": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    },
    "rdfs:label": {
      "type": [
        "string",
        "null"
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "@value"
  ],
  "schema:name": "electrodeID",
  "schema:description": "Unique identifier for the electrode, to match and be referenced in channel description.",

  "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
```

</details>

## Electrode Probe Identifier

**Label:** electrodeProbeID

**Description:** Identifier to specify which shank of the probe the electrode is present. Alternatively, electrode probe identifier could be used here.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/196db820-9653-48fc-8fdd-4a5d9d2eafa1) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",

    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",

    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",

      "@type": "xsd:string"

    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"

      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"

      "@type": "@id"
```

## Electrode Shank Identifier

**Label:** shankID

**Description:** Id to specify which shank of the probe the electrode is on. This is useful for spike sorting when the electrodes are on a multi-shank probe.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/2436595b-8f97-4510-b77e-ff0d21499911) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
  "@context": {
    "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
    "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
    "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
    "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
    "schema": "http://schema.org/",
    "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
    "schema:name": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "schema:description": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:prefLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "skos:altLabel": {
      "@type": "xsd:string"
    },
    "pav:createdOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "pav:createdBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    },
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
      "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
    },
    "oslc:modifiedBy": {
      "@type": "@id"
    }

  "description": "shankID field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56",
  "_ui": {
    "inputType": "textfield"
  },
  "_valueConstraints": {
    "requiredValue": false
  },
  "properties": {
    "@type": {
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "type": "string",
          "format": "uri"

          "type": "array",
```

## Electrode Hemisphere

**Label:** electrodeHemisphere

**Description:** Brain hemisphere where the electrode was located.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/ceb3a73a-6a08-420c-8877-c20db0f6325e) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
```

## Electrode X position

**Label:** electrodeX

**Description:** Recorded position along the local x-axis relative to the probe origin and rotation.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** numeric

**Unit of Measure:** mm

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/9ab92949-d477-4478-ad12-702cc2e0f73f) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** numeric

## Electrode Impedance

**Label:** electrodeImpedance

**Description:** Impedance of the electrode or pipette (pipette_resistance). This can be a single value or a list of two values indicating a value range. It must be in kOhm

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified
